item.title: Sen. Jim Justice, wife sued for $5 million in unpaid taxes from 2009 as legal woes mount
item.description: A federal judge recently ruled the coal mining heir owed more than $29 million in damages for breaching a contract with a bond-surety company.

item.title: Sen. Mark Kelly faces Pentagon investigation for making video on refusing 'unlawful orders'
item.description: President Donald Trump called Sen. Mark Kelly and five other Democratic lawmakers "traitors" for their roles in the video.
